tags: would you still love me the same
summary:
Would You Still Love Me The Same
Falling For You
Pairing: Taehyung/Jungkook x Reader
Genre: Angst
Previous —...
body:
Would You Still Love Me The Same

Falling For You

Pairing: Taehyung/Jungkook x Reader

Genre: Angst

Previous — Next

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

You had fallen into a restless sleep dreaming about Taehyung again. It felt like something was pulling you deep into a black hole making it hard for you to breathe and no matter how hard you tried to escape you never got away.

You woke up to the sound of your phone ringing on your bedside table. With a sigh, you picked it up your eyes going wide as soon as you saw the name on your screen.

Jungkook.

Thinking back to the lovely coffee date a week ago a small smile tugged at your lips. He had picked you up and drove you to a small café in town where you both had talked the whole evening until you decided to go for a walk along the beach. It was a relaxing and comfortable day something you hadn‘t had in a while.

Jungkook managed to make you smile so effortlessly and you were surprised at the way you felt around him. Everything about him was so calm and safe.

„Hello?“, you croaked still half asleep. You could hear his chuckle through the phone and it gave you a warm feeling in your chest. „You‘re still in bed?“, he asked clearly amused at the fact that it made you look up at the clock on your wall. You sat up immediately wide awake trying to kick off the sheets that were tangled around your legs. „Shit! I‘m running late!“ You were running around trying to find your things and get ready to head out. All while having your phone pressed tightly between your shoulder and ear. „Don‘t worry. I‘ll be there in five minutes“, he giggled before hanging up. You stood there for a moment puzzled about his words.

That was a joke right?

Five minutes later you were still busy trying to tame your hair with a brush when you heard a honk outside. You looked out the window only to see the same black car that dropped you off last time parked in your driveway. Jungkook got out and leaned against the hood his eyes moving upward to meet yours. He waved at you excitedly his significant bunny smile visible even from this distance. You waved back at him completely lost in how good he looked today in his grey hoodie and his messy brown hair hidden underneath a bucket hat the curls almost covering his eyes when he looked up at you.

Suddenly Jungkook started laughing while pointing to his head as if he wanted to tell you something. Only then you realized your hair brush which was tangling down from your still messy hair. Pulling it out you immediately turned away trying to hide the shade of pink that your cheeks had turned into.

A few minutes later you locked the door behind you and made your way over to his car. Jungkook walked around and held the door on the passenger‘s side open for you while you got in muttering how he saved you today from being late. „Thank you, honestly!“ You repeated once he settled down next to you on his seat turning the car keys. He drove out of your driveway with a small smile on his lips. „It‘s my pleasure.“

You were on time for your class turning around to wave at Jungkook one last time before you went in. He‘d asked you to meet him in the library after class. „I need your help“, he had told you and you were ready to do whatever because he‘d done so much for you already. So when your last class for that day came to an end you made your way over to the library excited to see him again.

You entered the library and walked over to the very end of it where Jungkook had told you to meet him. When you passed by the last aisle you recognized the tuft of brown hair hiding behind a screen. Jungkook‘s gaze was fixed on the laptop in front of him his fingers eagerly moving across the keyboard. You looked at him for a moment drinking in his beauty the way his beautiful lips were pressed to a thin line and how he knit his thick brows while he was fully focused on his work. He never failed to look adorable to you and he didn‘t even have to try. You had to admit that you were slowly falling for this handsome boy.

You heard a sigh of relief escape his lips as he leaned back in his chair. That‘s when he noticed you standing there and his face immediately lit up revealing a boyish smile. Your cheeks heat up at being caught staring at him and you walked over to him quickly sitting down on the empty seat next to him. „So what can I do for you, Kookie?“ You tried to sound composed. Jungkook kept staring at you for a moment with a small smile tugged on his lips. Snapping out of it he cleared his throat moving his laptop closer to you so you would have a good view. „This is a montage of my summer trip with the boys. I just wanted to hear your thoughts on this one“, he explained softly scrolling through various files clicking on a file that read „G.C.F“.

You were amazed by his editing skills and you couldn‘t hold back the compliments from falling out of your mouth during the entire video making Jungkook smile with pride. He decided to show you more of his work from previous projects since you liked it so much. You both were so deeply focused on the screen that you didn‘t notice how the library had emptied itself already and you were the last students that were left. The old librarian kept glancing at her watch looking over to you with a frown.

You checked the time which caused your eyes to almost fall out. „Oh my god, it‘s already 8 pm, Namjoon is going to kill me!“, you panicked grabbing your things. Jungkook‘s eyes had gone wide too as he realized what time it was and started packing his things as well muttering apologies to you.

„It‘s okay. I had fun, your work is amazing Kookie! I have to go now.“ You said in a hurry kissing his cheek ready to storm off so you could catch the next bus until you felt a tight grip around your hand. The next thing you could feel was his lips on yours his other hand winding up behind your neck to hold you in place. You were too shocked to even react until you closed your eyes and let yourself fall finally returning the kiss.

It was quiet around you the librarian nowhere to be seen as Jungkook was kissing you so passionately. You could feel your heart hammering in your chest your weak knees threatening to give in. The moment got disturbed by a loud ringing from your phone. You groaned as Jungkook broke the kiss flashing his goofy smile at you slightly panting. You took out your phone and looked at your screen. It was Namjoon. But reading the message you stood rooted at your place your heart that was hammering not so long ago had stopped beating. The words repeating in your mind over and over again.

„Taehyung had been arrested for murder.“

Masterlist

reblog.comment:
Would You Still Love Me The Same

Falling For You

Pairing: Taehyung/Jungkook x Reader

Genre: Angst

Previous — Next

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

You had fallen into a restless sleep dreaming about Taehyung again. It felt like something was pulling you deep into a black hole making it hard for you to breathe and no matter how hard you tried to escape you never got away.

You woke up to the sound of your phone ringing on your bedside table. With a sigh, you picked it up your eyes going wide as soon as you saw the name on your screen.

Jungkook.

Thinking back to the lovely coffee date a week ago a small smile tugged at your lips. He had picked you up and drove you to a small café in town where you both had talked the whole evening until you decided to go for a walk along the beach. It was a relaxing and comfortable day something you hadn‘t had in a while.

Jungkook managed to make you smile so effortlessly and you were surprised at the way you felt around him. Everything about him was so calm and safe.

„Hello?“, you croaked still half asleep. You could hear his chuckle through the phone and it gave you a warm feeling in your chest. „You‘re still in bed?“, he asked clearly amused at the fact that it made you look up at the clock on your wall. You sat up immediately wide awake trying to kick off the sheets that were tangled around your legs. „Shit! I‘m running late!“ You were running around trying to find your things and get ready to head out. All while having your phone pressed tightly between your shoulder and ear. „Don‘t worry. I‘ll be there in five minutes“, he giggled before hanging up. You stood there for a moment puzzled about his words.

That was a joke right?

Five minutes later you were still busy trying to tame your hair with a brush when you heard a honk outside. You looked out the window only to see the same black car that dropped you off last time parked in your driveway. Jungkook got out and leaned against the hood his eyes moving upward to meet yours. He waved at you excitedly his significant bunny smile visible even from this distance. You waved back at him completely lost in how good he looked today in his grey hoodie and his messy brown hair hidden underneath a bucket hat the curls almost covering his eyes when he looked up at you.

Suddenly Jungkook started laughing while pointing to his head as if he wanted to tell you something. Only then you realized your hair brush which was tangling down from your still messy hair. Pulling it out you immediately turned away trying to hide the shade of pink that your cheeks had turned into.

A few minutes later you locked the door behind you and made your way over to his car. Jungkook walked around and held the door on the passenger‘s side open for you while you got in muttering how he saved you today from being late. „Thank you, honestly!“ You repeated once he settled down next to you on his seat turning the car keys. He drove out of your driveway with a small smile on his lips. „It‘s my pleasure.“

You were on time for your class turning around to wave at Jungkook one last time before you went in. He‘d asked you to meet him in the library after class. „I need your help“, he had told you and you were ready to do whatever because he‘d done so much for you already. So when your last class for that day came to an end you made your way over to the library excited to see him again.

You entered the library and walked over to the very end of it where Jungkook had told you to meet him. When you passed by the last aisle you recognized the tuft of brown hair hiding behind a screen. Jungkook‘s gaze was fixed on the laptop in front of him his fingers eagerly moving across the keyboard. You looked at him for a moment drinking in his beauty the way his beautiful lips were pressed to a thin line and how he knit his thick brows while he was fully focused on his work. He never failed to look adorable to you and he didn‘t even have to try. You had to admit that you were slowly falling for this handsome boy.

You heard a sigh of relief escape his lips as he leaned back in his chair. That‘s when he noticed you standing there and his face immediately lit up revealing a boyish smile. Your cheeks heat up at being caught staring at him and you walked over to him quickly sitting down on the empty seat next to him. „So what can I do for you, Kookie?“ You tried to sound composed. Jungkook kept staring at you for a moment with a small smile tugged on his lips. Snapping out of it he cleared his throat moving his laptop closer to you so you would have a good view. „This is a montage of my summer trip with the boys. I just wanted to hear your thoughts on this one“, he explained softly scrolling through various files clicking on a file that read „G.C.F“.

You were amazed by his editing skills and you couldn‘t hold back the compliments from falling out of your mouth during the entire video making Jungkook smile with pride. He decided to show you more of his work from previous projects since you liked it so much. You both were so deeply focused on the screen that you didn‘t notice how the library had emptied itself already and you were the last students that were left. The old librarian kept glancing at her watch looking over to you with a frown.

You checked the time which caused your eyes to almost fall out. „Oh my god, it‘s already 8 pm, Namjoon is going to kill me!“, you panicked grabbing your things. Jungkook‘s eyes had gone wide too as he realized what time it was and started packing his things as well muttering apologies to you.

„It‘s okay. I had fun, your work is amazing Kookie! I have to go now.“ You said in a hurry kissing his cheek ready to storm off so you could catch the next bus until you felt a tight grip around your hand. The next thing you could feel was his lips on yours his other hand winding up behind your neck to hold you in place. You were too shocked to even react until you closed your eyes and let yourself fall finally returning the kiss.

It was quiet around you the librarian nowhere to be seen as Jungkook was kissing you so passionately. You could feel your heart hammering in your chest your weak knees threatening to give in. The moment got disturbed by a loud ringing from your phone. You groaned as Jungkook broke the kiss flashing his goofy smile at you slightly panting. You took out your phone and looked at your screen. It was Namjoon. But reading the message you stood rooted at your place your heart that was hammering not so long ago had stopped beating. The words repeating in your mind over and over again.

„Taehyung had been arrested for murder.“

We are pleased to inform you that you have been accepted to Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

Students are to create their account within two (2) days and add the mod, we look forward to having you at our school.

Me: it's almost 2am, I'm tired and need to go to sleep.
Jikook: *uploads a video of them in the same car together*
Me: well...

Me: it’s almost 2am, I’m tired and need to go to sleep.

Jikook: *uploads a video of them in the same car together*

Me: well shit..

blog.name: xerostra
blog.title: my space of randomness
blog.description:
Just a place for my random stuff.
Wherever my mood/addiction, my dash or my sentimentality carries me...
queer, crying over tv shows & KPop... multi+polyshipper 
(PSA: no space for ship wars.
If you dislike Tony Stark, Rodney McKay, Rip Hunter: this is not the blog you're looking for)
....KPop has taken over my life instead of football (soccer) and I'm ok with that ;P.....(sry don't follow back automatically ^^ and often too lazy to tag my posts/reblogs properly!!!)

summary: ARMYs you can still vote for BBMAs
body:
ARMYs you can still vote for BBMAs

voting closes 12 pm PDT

BTS Top Social Artist

1) Vote on their voting page

all you need is a valid e-mail or facebook

you can vote 100x

http://www.billboard.com/bbmasvote

ADDITIONALLY

2) Vote on Twitter

you can vote 100x

use the correct tags: #BBMAsTopSocial and #BTS

Conclusion:

you still have 1 hr to give BTS at least 200 votes, so pls take that chance :)

(voting rules https://www.billboardmusicawards.com/2019-voting-rules/)

AND PLEASE don’t forget the

Boy With Luv MV

We can still break the 250M views record if we reach it in 2 days (currently 241M)

(don’t skip ads, don’t fast forward, don’t act like a bot (watch something else in between))
